content.title: Digital Products are being sent out!
content.creator:
Steve Baker
March 9, 2025
content.content:
I wanted to send out a quick update that the digital rewards are being sent to you backers that chose the print files rewards! The emails will be coming to the emails you have on file and will be coming from steve@bakermakes.com.
Please check your spam folder if you are not able to find your rewards, and please reach out to me if you do not receive your digital rewards by 12p EST tomorrow, March 8th. 
The physical rewards are being printed and will be sent out to you backers as soon as they are ready.
Once again, thank you all for your support and I am excited for you to receive your rewards!
Steve

content.title: Backer Surveys Are Sent!
content.creator:
Steve Baker
February 26, 2025
content.content: Keep your eyes open for the survey! The sooner they are all filled out, the sooner the rewards can start being sent. Thank you!

content.title: It's over! Thank you all
content.creator:
Steve Baker
February 24, 2025
content.content:
I'll keep this one short and sweet. Thank you all so very much for helping fund this campaign. I will work on getting the backer surveys out as soon as I can, and then start the work of fulfillment! 
Thanks again, everyone!

content.title: Overdue update: Thank you all!
content.creator:
Steve Baker
February 15, 2025
content.content:
Hi everyone,

We're in the back third of the campaign now, and I haven't had the chance to stop and thank you all for getting us past the goal line! We still have over a week to go, so please do me a favor and share this campaign with your friends, family, and complete strangers.
Logistics wise, I'm hoping to get the backer surveys out as soon as I can once the campaign ends. Those who are getting the digital files should get them pretty fast, and those who are ordering physical trays shouldn't be far behind.
Once again, thank you all for joining me on this journey. Please don't hesitate to comment or message me if you have any questions. 
Steve
